name: Little Buddies Game VR
description:
Use 5 different projectiles, each with a different power to control objects around you to make a path for the player to reach his friend without touching the gourd.  

Theme: One Time Use

What assets did you use in this project?

  • VR Integration Frame Work- Character Pack: Free Animal people sample
  • Desert Environment
  • Lava Flowing Shader
  • Highlight Plus
  • 3D Game Props
  • Skybox and Cubemap Variety Pack
  • Music and sounds form Youtube
  • Hart communicator and Gun models by my brother
